whyAiSpa.description: I explain in simple terms why Single Page Applications built with React and complete marketing package is the best choice for your business.

benefit1.title: React + TypeScript = reliability
benefit1.description: React is the most popular library for web development. TypeScript adds typing to minimize errors. Your website will be stable and easy to maintain.

benefit2.title: SPA = mobile app speed
benefit2.description: Single Page Application loads once and then works like a mobile app. Instant navigation, no reloads - visitors don't leave.

benefit3.title: Supabase = powerful backend
benefit3.description: I use Supabase to create a powerful backend with database, authentication, and API. Your site is ready to scale.

benefit4.title: Complete marketing package
benefit4.description: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, Analytics, Tag Manager, Search Console - everything configured and ready to use.

benefit5.title: Detailed analytics from day one
benefit5.description: Get the complete picture: where visitors come from, what they do on site, how much they spend, ROI of each advertising channel.

benefit6.title: Easy management and scaling
benefit6.description: React components are easy to edit and extend. TypeScript protects from errors. You can safely add new features.

react.title: Why React + TypeScript?
react.point3: TypeScript protects from errors and improves DX
react.point4: SEO optimization possible with right approach

faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about creating SPA websites with React and setting up complete marketing package.
faq.question1: What is SPA and why is it better than regular website?
faq.answer1: SPA (Single Page Application) is a website that loads once and then works like a mobile app. Instead of reloading the entire page on transitions, only content changes. Result: speed, better UX, higher conversion.
faq.question2: How long does it take to create a SPA website?
faq.answer2: Usually 5-7 business days. React + TypeScript allow quick creation of quality components, and Supabase provides ready backend. Most time is spent setting up all marketing tools.
faq.question3: What exactly is included in the $300 price?
faq.answer3: Complete package: React SPA development, TypeScript, responsive design, Supabase backend, SEO optimization, Google Ads setup, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, Analytics, Tag Manager, Search Console, hosting for a year.
faq.question4: Will I be able to track advertising effectiveness?
faq.answer4: Yes! You'll get complete analytics: how many visitors from each advertising channel, conversions, ROI, user behavior. All in convenient Google Analytics and Facebook Business Manager dashboards.
faq.answer5: React + TypeScript ensure high code reliability. Supabase guarantees 99.9% uptime. Your website will work stably even under high loads.
faq.question6: Will I be able to add content myself?
faq.answer6: Yes! I'll set up a convenient admin panel through Supabase or teach you to work with code. React components are easy to edit. First changes are free.
faq.question7: How does SEO work for SPA?
faq.answer7: I use Server-Side Rendering and proper meta tag structure. Set up Google Search Console for position tracking. SPAs can rank just as well as regular websites.
faq.question8: What to do after website launch?
faq.answer8: I'll set up all advertising campaigns and analytics. You'll receive detailed instructions for working with advertising dashboards and optimization recommendations for better results.
